last_episode_to_air.name: The Reunion
last_episode_to_air.overview: Our couples meet again after spending time away from the island. Amazing stories await from the hands of Sergio, Angie, Heroes, Tempters, and a few surprises in this exciting episode that answers the question, what happens after returning from Temptation Island: Mexico?

name: Temptation Island México
overview: Til Temptation do us part! Couples who find themselves at a crossroads, travel to a tropical paradise to look for answers and test their relationship. Will the couples be able to resist in betrayal with the sexy tempters? Our hosts, Mexican popstars Sergio O’Farrill and Angie Taddei steer the journey on whether participants will commit to a forever relationship or go their separate ways.

episodes.name: Passion Puts Fidelity to the Test
episodes.overview: It's time to disembark on the island, and the hardest test is coming. Saying goodbye to your partner has never been so difficult, especially by being surrounded by temptations that can turn a dream into a nightmare. The seduction games begin and it is well said: you reap what you sow.

episodes.name: You Can Look but You Can't Touch!
episodes.overview: The temptation light is ready to activate, and the paranoia of the girls is triggered to the maximum. The guys question whether coming to the island was the best decision. Meanwhile, a new temptation arrives in each villa to elevate the competition. The first bonfire leaves the boys in shock.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Lights of Temptation
episodes.overview: The heroes return from the first bonfire and encounter a surprise from the tempters. The Temptation Light plays with the minds of the guys and corrupts Dadvian. Connections deepen during the second date. The first bonfire for the girls will forever change the course of the island.

episodes.name: A Bad Omen
episodes.overview: With temptations escalating, both villas become embroiled in a Temptation Lights war. Dadvian makes a decision that alters the fate of the island, as distress and anxiety grip the guys. In the girl's villa connections strengthen as temperatures rise.

episodes.name: Revenge is a Sweet Temptation
episodes.overview: The heroes are about to make decisions that could affect their relationship forever. The Island burns with passion, feelings, temptations and seduction are growing bigger. The connections are getting stronger and stronger. The temperature starts to rise in the villages and someone will finally give in to temptation and break the Golden Rule!

episodes.name: The Confrontation
episodes.overview: Hearts are filled with sorrow, pain, and fear at the possibility of losing the person with whom they have shared the last few years of their lives. At the same time, their relationships with the temptations are getting stronger: hugs, kisses, and a very much closer intimacy make it evident. Facing the confusion becomes indispensable to start defining how or with whom they want to leave the island.

episodes.name: The Point of No Return
episodes.overview: The next-to-last bonfire requires courage and leaves frustrations; the return of the banned tempters has an analgesic effect on heartaches. The last dates will last 24 hours; the bonds are already created. Moments filled with uncertainty are experienced. What was experienced on the island, might be strong enough for them to choose to reinvent themselves in love.

episodes.name: The Final Bonfire
episodes.overview: The 24-hour dates come to an end and it's time for the heroes to say goodbye to the temptations. Girls and guys pack their bags to leave the villas and mentally prepare to face their partners in the final bonfire.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Our couples meet again after spending time away from the island. Amazing stories await from the hands of Sergio, Angie, Heroes, Tempters, and a few surprises in this exciting episode that answers the question, what happens after returning from Temptation Island: Mexico?
